title: Akuyaku Reijo No Tsuiho Go! Kyokai Kaikaku Gohan De Yuyu Sister Kurashi - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Beautiful Female Lead   Cooking   Dense Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Knights   Reincarnation   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Yuzuhara Tail   柚原テイル
description: Event planner Yuka Sawatani‘s life ended as the result of overwork. Reborn into an Otome game with her memory intact, she becomes the villainess Elizabeth. She tries to resist her fate, but at the ending of the game, she is promptly banished.>
